item.title: About
item.description: Hi there My name is Konstantin. And welcome to my personal blog! I’m glad to announce that I’ve started my fabulous DevOps path and I solemnly swear to share any useful knowledge I get on the way. So far, I’m learning Linux (RHCSA), networking (CCNA) and python. Basic stuff goes first. Hope it will be usuful for all of us. Find me and contact at: linkedin telegram github
